bibl.title: The Symbol of Cleopatra Selene: Reading Crocodiles on Coins in the Late Republic and Early Principate.
bibl.note: Introduction. - AEGVPTO CAPTA. - The symbol of Egypt? - Cleopatra VII and the Ptolemaic dynasty. - Crocodile coins from Crete and Cyrenaica. - Ptolemaic crocodile coinage in the Roman Empire. - Conclusion. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Jane Draycott, The Symbol of Cleopatra Selene: Reading Crocodiles on Coins in the Late Republic and Early Principate.
